languages.text: Среди слов прощания и восхвалений покойного выделяется свежая надпись — "Покаяние", и ниже подпись — "Фид...". Буквы выведены коряво и едва читаются.
Among the words of parting and praise for the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are crabbed and barely legible.
languages.original_text: Среди слов прощания и восхвалений покойного выделяется свежая надпись — "Покаяние", и ниже подпись — "Фид...". Буквы выведены коряво и едва читаются.

traits.locale_text: Among the words of parting and praises of the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are scrawly and barely legible.
Among the words of parting and praises of the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are scrawly and barely legible.
Among the words of parting and praise for the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are crabbed and barely legible.
Among the words of parting and praise for the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are crabbed and barely legible.
Among the words of parting and praise for the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are crabbed and barely legible.

languages.text: 悼念册上写满了对死者的祝福与赞美之词。其中有个不久之前被人写上去的词“忏悔”，看起来格外引人注目。下面还有个签名“菲——”，但字迹残缺不全，几乎无法辨认。
languages.original_text: Among the words of parting and praise for the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are crabbed and barely legible.

traits.locale_text: 悼念册上写满了对死者的祝福与赞美之词。其中有个不久之前被人写上去的词“忏悔”，看起来格外引人注目。下面还有个签名“菲——”，但字迹残缺不全，几乎无法辨认。

languages.text: Entre las despedidas y los elogios dirigidos a los muertos, una entrada nueva destaca: «Arrepentimiento», firmada por «Fid...». El texto está borroso y apenas es legible.
languages.original_text: Among the words of parting and praise for the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are crabbed and barely legible.

traits.locale_text: Entre las despedidas y los elogios dirigidos a los muertos, una entrada nueva destaca: «Arrepentimiento», firmada por «Fid...». El texto está borroso y apenas es legible.

languages.text: 故人への別れの言葉や賛美の言葉の中に、新たに書き残された文字が目に飛び込んできた―『リペンタンス』という言葉の下には「フィデ…」と署名されている。殴り書きでほとんど読めない。
languages.original_text: Among the words of parting and praise for the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are crabbed and barely legible.

traits.locale_text: 故人への別れの言葉や賛美の言葉の中に、新たに書き残された文字が目に飛び込んできた―『リペンタンス』という言葉の下には「フィデ…」と署名されている。殴り書きでほとんど読めない。

languages.text: Zwischen Worten des Abschieds und der Lobpreisungen für den Verstorbenen sticht ein neuer Eintrag heraus – "Repentanz" und darunter eine Unterschrift: "Fid..." Die Buchstaben sind krakelig und kaum lesbar.
languages.original_text: Among the words of parting and praise for the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are crabbed and barely legible.

traits.locale_text: Zwischen Worten des Abschieds und der Lobpreisungen für den Verstorbenen sticht ein neuer Eintrag heraus – "Repentanz" und darunter eine Unterschrift: "Fid..." Die Buchstaben sind krakelig und kaum lesbar.

languages.text: Parmi les différents vœux et hommages écrits en l'honneur du défunt, le mot « Repentance » semble avoir été écrit très récemment et est accompagné d'une signature : « Fid... » La plupart des lettres sont illisibles.
languages.original_text: Among the words of parting and praise for the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are crabbed and barely legible.

traits.locale_text: Parmi les différents vœux et hommages écrits en l'honneur du défunt, le mot « Repentance » semble avoir été écrit très récemment et est accompagné d'une signature : « Fid... » La plupart des lettres sont illisibles.

languages.text: Rahmetliye veda ve övgü sözlerinin arasında yeni yazılmış bir yazı dikkat çekiyor: "Tövbe". Altında da bir imza var: "Fid..." Harfler kargacık burgacık ve zor okunuyor.
languages.original_text: Among the words of parting and praise for the deceased, a fresh entry stands out — "Repentance," with a signature underneath — "Fid..." The letters are crabbed and barely legible.

traits.locale_text: Rahmetliye veda ve övgü sözlerinin arasında yeni yazılmış bir yazı dikkat çekiyor. "Tövbe", altında da bir imza var "Fid..." Harfler eciş bücüş ve zor okunuyor.
